# The King of Everything Else

| recorded     = 2012–14

| rev2 = Exclaim!

| rev3 = HipHopDX
| rev3score = 3/5
}}
The King of Everything Else is the third solo studio album by American rapper Slaine. It was released on August 19, 2014 through Suburban Noize Records. Produced by Louis "LÃ¼ Balz" Bell, The Arcitype, DJ Lethal and Statik Selektah with co-producer OshBeats, it features guest appearances from Rite Hook, Apathy, Bishop Lamont, Checkmark, Ill Bill, Jaysaun, Madchild, Moroney, Regan Hartley, Reks, Tech N9NE, Termanology and Vinnie Paz. The album peaked at number 189 on the Billboard 200, number 26 on the Top R&B/Hip-Hop Albums, number 15 on the Top Rap Albums, number 30 on the Independent Albums and number 4 on the Heatseekers Albums charts in the United States.
